column2: Cast a spell from a lore you know

Make your enemies flee in terror!
Unleash the winds of magic on your foe!
Call upon the storms of the North!
Call upon the beasts of the wild!
Let the very rocks cry out!
Draw upon the power of the realm of the dead!
Change the path of the battle!
This magic seems pretty dangerous. Maybe I'll sit this round out.
